channel.title: A list of things that interest me on Diptanuj Sarkar
channel.description: Recent content in A list of things that interest me on Diptanuj Sarkar

item.title: Philosophy
item.description: My thoughts on the philosophy that I have read
item.content:encoded:
The goal here is to put together a collection of (opinionated) notes on the stuff I read on my own, and at the Mohanpur Circle (Philosophy Circle at IISER Kolkata). I do not know much philosophy - so I will definitely be drawing from SEP and other authoritative sources a lot. Finally, this is not meant to be helpful as a guide (though, I would be quite happy if it turns out to be one someday). Rather, it is something that I can commit to building as I go along learning more. This will be organised on the basis of readings, and branch from there based on hyperlinks.

  • (Mohanpur Circle, 11-01-2025 - Present): The Ethics of Belief, William K. Clifford - Epistemology, Ethics, Philosophy of Mind, Psychology.

item.title: Electronics
item.description: Tinkering and playing around with electronics is just about my main hobby - or atleast it used to be. I’m working on regaining my skills, now that I have the time to do so.
item.content:encoded: Tinkering and playing around with electronics is just about my main hobby - or atleast it used to be. I’m working on regaining my skills, now that I have the time to do so.

item.title: Software
item.description: As of right now (06-01-2025), I am using Cachy OS. I may be hallucinating it, but all of the Kernel Optimisation mumbo-jumbo that it is doing seems to be working. I am using

item.title: Music
item.content:encoded: I don’t have anything that I would like to put up here right now - so here is my last.fm, and here is my RYM. I hope to talk about the music that I listen to here, soon!
